user.title: Fritz!Box VPN Configuration
user.description: Please enter your FritzBox connection details. If a FritzBox integration is already configured, the data will be automatically used.

confirm.title: Fritz!Box VPN Found
confirm.description: A FritzBox was automatically discovered: {host}. Please confirm the configuration.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to FritzBox. Please check the IP address and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check username and password. If credentials are correct, enable TR-064 (Permit access for apps) in the FritzBox under Home Network > Network > Network settings > Access Settings in the Home Network. Note: UPnP is only needed for automatic discovery, not for API access.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for details. Make sure TR-064 (Permit access for apps) is enabled in the FritzBox.
error.config_entry_not_found: Config entry not found. Please add the integration again.

abort.not_fritzbox: The discovered device is not a FritzBox.
abort.no_host: Could not determine the IP address.

init.title: Fritz!Box VPN Options
init.description: Update your FritzBox connection details. The password field is not displayed for security reasons. Leave it empty to keep the current password, or enter a new password to change it.

data.password: Password (leave empty to keep current password)
